headline: Sherwin-Williams (SHW): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q4 Earnings?
summary: Over the last six months, Sherwin-Williams’s shares have sunk to $338.99, producing a disappointing 10.3% loss while the S&P 500 was flat. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: Tracking Ole Andreas Halvorsen's Viking Global Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
summary: Viking Global's 13F stock portfolio increased from $27.44B to $30.90B, with holdings rising from 83 to 86. Read more to see the portfolio's Q4 2024 review.
